Content: A large gathering of troops in Kilinochchi and students at Aravinagar faculty of the Jaffna University participated in a “Music Therapy” programme on Saturday (2) at Nelumpiyasa auditorium, organized by the SFHQ -KLN on the instructions of the Commander Security Forces Kilinochchi, Major General G.V. Ravipriya. The veteran musician, Mr. K Pradeep Bogahawatte and members of the Crescendo Music Institution carried out the project. Commander Security Forces Kilinochchi graced the event as the Chief Guest along with Senior Officers and Officers. More than 1500 participated in the music therapy programme.
